review: My daughter got airline crack in right hand near tennis elbow. Everything was good in explaining the issue and xray. They advised to put POP bandage and charged me 1800/- only for POP. When I asked why this much cost they simply told that they are using best pop. *** * ******* *** *** **** *** ***** ** **** ****** *** **** **** **** * ******** ***** **** *** ***   **** ******** **** ***** *** This is not at all accepted.** *** *** **** *** ****** **  ******* *** **** ****** ****** They asked to visit after 1week and told they may need to extend the bandage if it got loosen. They said they will charge same Rs.1800/- I straight away told that I won't visit this clinic one more time.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I slipped myswlf while coming outof washroom and i landed myself with fullbweight in left wrist.ain increased along woth swelling. Booked appointment in practo and went. Doctor checked and asked me to take x-ray. The nurse who handled me was not friendly and was pressing my wrist at pain point.
Doctor just wrote the medicine and gave us. Until we ask te questions he didn't explain what was the issue. He said its an airlone crack and i need to put crape bandage and if pain is there even the white bandage. Myself and my husband qas not convinced with his treatment also they charged 500 for xray costlier than outside.

Took a second consultation to a different doctor *** ** **** *** **** * ****** *** ***** ** ** **** * ***** ********

Not even a Star for this place .. Highly not recommended uwill not be able to claim even 1 rupee if u have insurance.. 

No GSTN number. **** ** **** **** ******* *** ** **** ** ***** When ased for name on xray they are writing the name on xray sheet with white Pencile. 

When asked for system generated bill . Receptionist says even then GSTN number will not be provided .  

Patient had a broken ankle and the staff at the reception says to wait as there are OP patients in que for consultation.  A patient with emergency situation is asked to wait in que ?? The receptionist is very rude and unprofessional.. No proper planning .. Doctor takes care of patients and comes out in middle for taking xray himself.. 

Xray report takes 1 hour .. when asked the best answer is that Xray is drying it's wet still.. ?? ******** ** **** * **

Expensive place.. 

Medicine are only avilable in their pharmacy.

The doctor was very understanding and heard out my issue and didn't over prescribe medication or physiotherapy. In clinic physiotherapist helped me understand how to prevent future injuries. Great experience would recommend. Very affordable.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I am happy with doctor, he explained well regarding the problem root cause. If any x-ray taken the report will given with in 1hr.

review: Very bad experience. Please do not visit this place. Took my baby there and he had no little patience ** ***** *** **** ********* No explanation, no proper cause details nothing. Neither treated too. Less than a minute but charged 400. Money isnt problem and that amount is spent for nothing at all.!

The medicine doctor prescribe cannot be purchased outside. If you ask the front desk, the response is not polite. Doctor does consultation and Medicines. You cannot force the patient to purchase the medicines as well.
Excellent... Listened patiently... Was advised for an x-ray. The clinic has xray unit attached and physiotherapy too.
